vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνθρύπτω,
break in pieces: crush, τὴν καρδίαν [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to crush to pieces;, metaphorically to break the heart of any one, to make to recoil in fear, Acts 21:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 破成碎片
2) 傷了一個人的心 (徒 21:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 破成碎片
2) 伤了一个人的心 (徒 21:13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm vỡ tan; làm tan nát; làm vỡ; // làm tan nát con tim; làm đau lòng. σύν (G4862) + θρυπτω.
